work.name: University of British Columbia
work.summary: Developed a customized Drupal CMS integrated with React app as RESTful API, saving 15,000 dollars annually. Implemented modules in PHP for data retrieval, enhancing security and reducing API calls by 80% in the CMS. Enhanced front-end design based on conducted user study, boosting user understanding and engagement by 25%.

work.name: Tableau (Salesforce)
work.summary: Developed features for a ML/AI model usability product integrated into Tableauâ€™s data visualization platform by helping onboard new datatype. Created new Java API endpoints to enable the use of ML/AI predictive models in existing code base. Implemented front-end functionality using TypeScript, React, and Redux, allowing clients to effectively organize their models in the web client and application.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.
